attributes.action: Idiots who pave front gardens, astroturf lawns & put plastic down loos MUST PAY!
attributes.additional_details: Our rivers are full of plop. The sewage companies are partly to blame. So are some people and organisations. Those who should pick up the tab for clean-up investment should include those with huge roofs, paved front gardens, giant car parks, and astroturf lawns. They should pay along with those who put plastic down loos and cooking fat down sewers. Make the polluters pay!
attributes.background: Those who pave front gardens, astroturf lawns & put plastic down loos contribute to overloading sewage systems in all unreasonable ways must pay extra.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about certain structures and practices, but it's not clear exactly who you want to be required to make an additional financial contribution, and if you want these payments to be in the form of fines, or fees for certain actions.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
